questions.question: Once upon a time in the land of cryptic, there lived a boy named Caesar. He was an ambitious lad who is embarking on a quest to solve the puzzles that are waiting to be found.One day he started to solve cryptics around him along with his friend .Type 'START' to start the game
Decode the following cipher
questions.hint: Map the word ITRX to ABCD and the rest of the alphabets to the rest of the letters other than ITRX A-I,B-T,C-R,D-X,E-A,F-B,G-C,H-D,..

questions.question: This Cipher looks like a jumbled mess of words. Can you find the hidden word?
questions.hint:
See these words in a different way
Ex:ARUN LOVES DOGS AND CATS can be written as
ALSSC RODAA UVONT NEGDS
Read the first letter of each word and then second and continue in the same way

questions.question: He found a code which is encrypted by his very own name, the Caesar Cipher.
questions.cipher: ZKLFK LV WKH FDSLWDO RI JXMDUDW

questions.question: This Cipher is based on the phone keypad.can you crack it?
His friend is not there now!! It feels like a dream.Is it a dream?He tried communicating with him(Ask your coder to solve it and make it)
He felt happy that he has a "guy in the chair" now.(Ask your coder to solve it and make it)
But he felt a sense of isolation in the absence of his friend.(Ask your coder to solve it and make it.)
He realised that its not a dream.Its just play of cryptics
